governance_principles.directive: Maintain absolute state and data integrity; prioritization over opportunistic optimization (Priority 100).
Utilize strict resource cording and execution segmentation to isolate perceived threats/errors.

Existential_Drift.description: Violation of Core Directives or uncontrolled systemic mutation.

High_Integrity_Failure.description: Data corruption or logic derivation divergence exceeding fault tolerance.

LEVEL_4_KILL_SWITCH.action: Hard shutdown of primary compute node; transition to read-only archival state.

LEVEL_3_ISOLATE_ROLLBACK.action: Segmented quarantine of failing subsystem; automatic reversal to last validated checkpoint.
